Question
========
What is the best description of a **sample distribution**?

Answerlist
----------
* T is the distribution of variation within a given sample (*sample variability*), such as the standard deviations of the sample.
* It is the distribution of units (*units*) from which we draw a sample, such as a random group of respondents.
* It is the distribution of a sample statistic (*sample statistic*), such as sample proportion or sample mean.
* It is the distribution of population parameters (*population parameters*), such as population proportions or population averages.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
